raw akas.title: Desafía tu cuerpo con Khloé Kardashian

akas: Revenge Body with Khloé Kardashian (original title)
Desafía tu cuerpo con Khloé Kardashian Spain
akas from release info: Revenge Body with Khloé Kardashian (original title)
Desafía tu cuerpo con Khloé Kardashian Spain

1.title: Web of Lies & Mommy Issues

episode of.title: Revenge Body with Khloé Kardashian (TV Series 2017– )

1.plot: Khloé and her team of experts help Ken rediscover himself after a difficult childhood. With Khloé's team's help, Melody hopes to gain the confidence to stand up to her mom once and for all.

2.title: Invisible Girl & Living a Lie

episode of.title: Revenge Body with Khloé Kardashian (TV Series 2017– )

2.plot: Having long battled her weight, Hollywood publicist Melissa is used to feeling invisible and constantly in the shadows of her clients. With the help of Khloé and crush-worthy trainer-to-the-stars Corey Calliet, Melissa happily claims the spotlight for herself for a change. The son of Indian immigrants, the very un-traditional Mayank yearns to prove himself to his traditional parents - but wants to avoid telling them he's gay. Both Khloé and fitness phenom Gunnar Peterson agree Mayank's deception stands in the way of his success both in and out of the gym and encourage...

3.title: Episode #2.3

episode of.title: Revenge Body with Khloé Kardashian (TV Series 2017– )

3.plot: An accident tore Kelsey Rose's career from her, so Khloé has Gunnar Peterson and Ashley Graham get her back on the runway. Joel wants revenge on his ex, but his behavior leads to a surprise.

4.title: Lost Identity & Never Been Kissed

episode of.title: Revenge Body with Khloé Kardashian (TV Series 2017– )

4.plot: Khloé and celebrity trainer Luke Milton help Kevin become the man he wants to be and Shayla goes on a journey of discovering who she really is.

5.title: Binge Eating Bachelorette & Drill Sergeant

episode of.title: Revenge Body with Khloé Kardashian (TV Series 2017– )

5.plot: Crysta binges because she's unhappy in her relationship. Will she decide her BF is the one? Mike turned to food after a tragic military accident. Khloé helps restore him to the man he was.

6.title: Eye of the Tiger & The Other Woman

episode of.title: Revenge Body with Khloé Kardashian (TV Series 2017– )

6.plot: With the help of Khloé and Luke Milton, Rocco hopes to lead by example and turn around his father's health. Jennifer hopes to become a bikini competitor Khloé and Ashley Borden's help.

7.title: Excuse Queen & Pop Star

episode of.title: Revenge Body with Khloé Kardashian (TV Series 2017– )

7.plot: 23-year-old Nicole teams up with trainer Latreal Mitchell to save her family's health. Unaccepted by his mother, Alexis hopes trainer Nicole Winhoffer will help set free his inner pop star.

8.title: The Odd Couple & the Ex Factor

episode of.title: Revenge Body with Khloé Kardashian (TV Series 2017– )

8.plot: In the hopes of becoming parents one day soon, newlyweds Chad and Allison are both on a mission to get healthy. The tricky part is, Allison has to lose weight, while Chad has to gain. Will trainer-to-the-stars Latreal Mitchell be able to keep both sides of this odd couple on track? Having endured the heartbreak of a cheating boyfriend, Rebecca wants to show her ex that he didn't crush her spirit and ruin her trust. But as we quickly learn, Rebecca's pain started years before they ever met - thus making expert trainer Simone de la Rue's task even tougher.

1.title: Muscle Cub & the Duff

episode of.title: Revenge Body with Khloé Kardashian (TV Series 2017– )

1.plot: Will's weight gain turns into heartbreak; Khloe and her roster of experts help him get his life back together and understand the meaning of true love.

2.title: Softball Sweethearts & Former Footballer

episode of.title: Revenge Body with Khloé Kardashian (TV Series 2017– )

2.plot: Sam and Nicole try to lose weight together; Sam doubts Nicole's commitment to shaping up; Dexter is tired of his man-boobs and wants to shut his taunting athletic father.

3.title: Revenge-ance & Liber-entitled

episode of.title: Revenge Body with Khloé Kardashian (TV Series 2017– )

3.plot: Jill has long been an emotional eater; experts help Jill rediscover her true self and show her sister that she's back on her feet for good; Sukhota wants to prove to both herself and her judgmental friends that she can win the battle of the of the bulge.

4.title: The Former Addict & the Future Bride

episode of.title: Revenge Body with Khloé Kardashian (TV Series 2017– )

4.plot: Jessy's mom encouraged her to lose weight as a teen Jessy found relief in drug use. Khloe helps out by reaching out to a group of experts to help Jessy lose weight the healthy way and getting her into the best shape of her life. Lauren suffers a traumatic loss at a young age that spiraled her weight gain. Team Khloe to the rescue.

5.title: Untying the Knot & Giraffically Sexy

episode of.title: Revenge Body with Khloé Kardashian (TV Series 2017– )

5.plot: Tiffany's pending divorce turns her world upside down; Khloé and her team transform her pain into gain; Jamie has been criticized for her appearance, but her journey of self-acceptance has her aspiring to reach new heights.

6.title: The Lost Voice & Half-Baked

episode of.title: Revenge Body with Khloé Kardashian (TV Series 2017– )

6.plot: After Ranella's dramatic weight gain brings her singing career to a halt, Khloé and celebrity trainer Corey Calliet help Ranella gain the courage to once again step on the stage; Brittany, a single mother, masks her pain with food.

7.title: From Mom to MILF

episode of.title: Revenge Body with Khloé Kardashian (TV Series 2017– )

7.plot: Gabriela emotionally eats to cope with her fiancé's cheating; her family is in the dark, she fears the news will devastate them; she is determined to be a healthy role model for her daughter.

8.title: Typecast & Camera Shy

episode of.title: Revenge Body with Khloé Kardashian (TV Series 2017– )

8.plot: Opera singer Anjelica's weight gain has resulted in her getting typecast in minor roles; Khloé and her squad of experts help Anjelica shape up and teach her the benefits of surrounding oneself with positivity.

imdb.plot outline: Khloe Kardashian helps fans who have gained weight get revenge on people who discouraged them during their weight gain. The team works with fitness trainers and get celebrity treatment along with confrontation of their enemy towards the end of their weight loss journey. Watch as the drama unfolds.
